####NOTE: the numbers on top of the bars in plots represent percentages

#Food Consumption

> how much you have spent from your income on basic food items for yourself or others over the past 30 days:

####Rice, Lentils, pulses, cereals, Edible oils, Spices
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width=14, fig.height=5, cache=TRUE}
plot_percent(phone, "fcrice", coordflippin = T) + scale_x_discrete(limits = mess_range)
#table(phone$fcrice, useNA = 'ifany')
```


####Meat and fish, Milk, butter, eggs, paneer, ghee, Fruit and vegetables
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width=14, fig.height=5, cache=TRUE}
plot_percent(phone, "fcmeat", coordflippin = T) + scale_x_discrete(limits = mess_range)
```


####Tea, coffee, Sugar, Other food and drink consumed outside the house, Special goods such as sweets, packaged snacks, soft drinks
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width=14, fig.height=5, cache=TRUE}
plot_percent(phone, "fcspice", coordflippin = T) + scale_x_discrete(limits = exp_range)
```


####How many times did you eat meat or fish in the last 30 days?
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width=14, fig.height=5, cache=TRUE}
plot_hist(phone, "fctimes_meat")
summary(phone$fctimes_meat)
```

####How many times did you skip a meal for not having enough money in the last 30 days?
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width=14, fig.height=5, cache=TRUE}
plot_hist(phone, "fcmeals_skip") + scale_x_discrete(limits = c(1:7))
summary(phone$fcmeals_skip)
```

#Non-Food Consumption

> How much did you spend from your income in total for yourself and others on the following items over the past 30 days?

####Rent and utilities  (individual or + spouse or other family in hh)


####Transportation
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width=14, fig.height=5, cache=TRUE}

```

####Phone Credit

####Health care expenses: doctors, vaccines, medicines, hospital visits, haircuts

####(non festive) Clothes, shoes, jeweley, Cosmetics, soap, toiletry products

####Ceremonies and festivals

#Savings

####How much savings do you currently have? Please include all savings and money set away in formal accounts, informal accounts, money saved in your name or together with spouse/other family members or friends in Dhaka or your place of origin.
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width=14, fig.height=5, cache=TRUE}
plot_percent(phone, "sgrange_sav", coordflippin = T) + scale_x_discrete(limits = sav_range)
```


####Please enter exact amount of all savings set away in formal accounts, informal accounts, money saved in your name or together with spouse/other family members or friends in Dhaka or your place of origin.
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width=14, fig.height=5, cache=TRUE}
plot_hist(phone, "sgam_sav", mean = T, bin1 = F)
summary(phone$sgam_sav)
```
